title: duck_coop_afternoon_temperature_record
summary: Afternoon temperature and humidity measurement inside a vacant duck coop.
description: This data unit records the second temperature and humidity measurement of the day inside a vacant duck coop. The reading was taken in the afternoon to observe environmental conditions after increased solar exposure. This measurement follows the first temperature record documented earlier in the day.

linked_references.note: First temperature and humidity record of the day in duck coop.

external_reference.note: Image shows HTC-2 display with temperature and humidity values.
